headline: Assessing Axon (AXON) Valuation After 19% Share Price Pullback and Strong Long-Term Returns
summary: Axon Enterprise (AXON) stock has recently seen a sharp decline over the past month, retreating by 19%. With this downturn, investors are assessing the company’s valuation in light of its consistent double-digit annual revenue and net income growth. See our latest analysis for Axon Enterprise. Zooming out, Axon Enterprise’s recent 19% share price slide comes after a period of strong long-term returns. The stock is still up a remarkable 190.6% in total shareholder return over three years and...
